title: Social Sector Project Design Based on Technology-Supported Self-Regulated Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Science Theories and Project-Based Learning Experience
context.additional_context: A self-directed learning and collaborative environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (planning, monitoring, evaluation) across projects with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can use technological tools (digital planners, analytical software) to review and adjust learning progress biweekly
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively evaluate self-regulated learning outcomes based on data collected during project execution
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
